item.title: Need help with noob questions
item.dc:creator: @kevin727 kevin727
item.description:
@kevin727 wrote:

what is compile?xD:p:p:p
and another question when i’m add a npc and go to npc handler.java and search moo and under moo and i add this

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1001)
{
if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay
{
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“ncer”))
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “ncer is Online!”;
}
else
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “ncer is Offline!”;
}
}
then i click on compile idk what it is but then it gives 100 errors and the npc doesn;t say ncer is online when i remove it then compile say nothing any1 help me plz?

Read full topic
